KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Structure comparison functions 003
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareGT compareNE compareLT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the comparison functions to do a case-sensitive comparison of two objects of the same type. A Boolean value is returned.

Syntax.Note: The key-value pair of the second Structure is greater than the key-value pair of the first Structure.
The key-value pair of the first Structure is lesser than the key-value pair of the second Structure.
Syntax.Hints: If you prefer an integer resulting from the comparison (0 for equal, -1 for less than, and 1 for greater than),
